It says, "By the power of his compassionate vow, the teacher ...
He arose to make a lantern of the world.
Sheingyun causes [his] abilities to arise.
Lingtong's ability to manifest the Dharma.
The sound of the bell causes the prohibition to pass away.
The old cypress drops its cold fragrance.
A strawberry wafts a shower of flowers.
You should know that taking in [people] is long-lasting.
Wu Dengquanshu, vol. 57
